description: Part approval of details pursuant to condition 3 (Materials of planning permission ref: P2014/2483/S73 dated 19/09/2014 for Application to vary condition 2 (approved plans), 3 (materials), 5 Inclusive Design), 7 (Passive Design), 8 (Green Roof), 9 (SUDS), 10 (BREEAM), 11 (Bird and Bat boxes), 13 (Rooftop Structures), 15 (Ventilation), 16 (Energy Strategy), 17 (Communal Boiler), 19 (Refuse/Recycling), 20 (Sound Insulation) and 21 (Cycle store) of planning permission ref: P121605 dated 21/12/2012 for 'Part demolition, refurbishment and erection of a part one and part two storey roof extension and new mezzanine floor level for use as office floor space (Class B1) at 29-39 Mount Pleasant. The change of use and refurbishment of part of the buildings including 5 Rosebery Avenue to provide a retail unit (Class A1) and 7 no residential dwellings (Class C3) and part demolition and erection of a single storey roof extension off Warner street for residential floor space (Class C3) as well as photovoltaic panels solar thermal panels plant and associated works'. Proposed amendments include reduced massing of 5th floor gallery; reduced massing of Warner Street extension; 1no. additional residential unit; redesigned cladding on extensions; removal of green wall; relocated entrances; internal reconfiguration; revised energy strategy; and amendments to details required to be submitted by conditions attached to permission ref: P121605.'
